alert.note: Alert for Bee; Goliad; Refugio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 17 at 4:29AM CDT until March 17 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GOLIAD...NORTHWESTERN REFUGIO AND SOUTHEASTERN BEE COUNTIES... At 428 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blanconia, or 10 miles northwest of Refugio, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Refugio, Woodsboro, Skidmore and Blanconia. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 650 and 668. US Highway 59 near mile marker 688. US Highway 77 between mile markers 614 and 630. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
